description:
tour.js: correctly restore saved lineno and syntax highlight cookies
CL 6494135 flipped the switch for syntax highlighting, but forget to update this part of tour.js, which suggests the js code has violated single source of truth principle.

Fixes issue 4135 (in the Go project).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=4914aa37f57f ***

tour.js: correctly restore saved lineno and syntax highlight cookies
CL 6494135 flipped the switch for syntax highlighting, but forget to update this part of tour.js, which suggests the js code has violated single source of truth principle.

Fixes issue 4135 (in the Go project).

R=adg
CC=gobot, golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6542062

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>
